channel.title: Player losses items in funpk
channel.description: Ok so I've searched google,runelocus ,runeserve r,bing ,yahoo and well There is not even hint on how to do this. So please do help. I am trying to make it so when someone dies in funpk they lose everything and all of it gets deleted, not dropped on the ground but completely deleted. I think a code should go under applydead void in playerassistant.java but I tried scripting a code myself and it didn't seem to work, It nulled when compiled and server ran, I am currently using a PI base atm, (Project Insanity) So please help. It would be appreciated alot and I've been searching for something like this for about 4 months.

I’m talking about the X and Y cords for the funpk.
